product_overview: A personal portfolio website with a distinct cartoon/comic style to showcase creative works, professional skills, and portfolio projects. The site aims to provide a playful yet professional online presence with an emphasis on centered and visually appealing layouts.
core_goals: Showcase creative projects and dashboard work with illustrative, cartoon-style design.
Provide an easy and professional means for recruiters, collaborators, and clients to contact the owner.
Create a unique and playful site with hand-drawn/cartoon styling consistent across pages.
Ensure responsive design for desktop and mobile devices.
Fix current layout issues specifically centering of hero section image and buttons, and navigation bar alignment.
key_features: Top horizontal navigation bar with centered links: Home, Profile/About Me, Portfolio/My Work, Contact.
Homepage hero section with a centered cartoon illustration, overlay text, and call-to-action buttons aligned center horizontally and vertically.
Profile/About page with bio, introduction, and descriptions of skills and creative approach.
Portfolio/My Work page displaying projects in a grid format, including titles, images, descriptions, and dashboard metrics.
Contact page with a clean, centered layout and placeholder text, planned enhancement for a contact form.
Use of reusable UI components like ComicPanel, HalftoneBG, MeteorShower, and SpeechBubble for styling and interactivity.
Consistent styling with Tailwind CSS, PostCSS, and global styles ensuring a warm, creative cartoon vibe.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the homepage, sees a centered cartoon hero image with text overlay and buttons to explore portfolio or contact.
User navigates via the top navigation bar to the Profile/About page to learn more about the ownerâ€™s bio and skills.
User visits the Portfolio/My Work page to browse projects displayed in a grid with images and descriptions.
User clicks on Contact from navigation to reach the contact page with a placeholder, currently showing 'Content coming soon!', with plans for a contact form later.
Responsive behavior allows seamless usage on desktop and mobile devices ensuring consistent layout and interaction.
validation_criteria: Hero section image and call-to-action buttons are horizontally and vertically centered across screen sizes.
Navigation bar is horizontally aligned and links are centered in the viewport.
Profile/About page content loads correctly with bio and text sections styled consistently.
Portfolio/My Work projects display in a grid format with images, titles, and descriptions matching design specifications.
Contact page loads with centered title and placeholder text visible; layout remains consistent on different devices.
All UI components render correctly and styles conform to the cartoon/comic theme using Tailwind CSS.
No layout or alignment issues remain for key pages following fixes, confirmed by visual and functional testing.
